text: "Love Me Again" is a 2013 song by English singer John Newman and is the lead single from his debut studio album Tribute. It topped the single charts in Greece and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain and Switzerland and peaked at number 30 in the United States. It was used on the soundtrack of the video game FIFA 14.FIFA 14 Official Soundtrack on EASports.com == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Love Me Again (song)
